channel.title: Fullscreen rep ++
channel.description:

item.title: Fullscreen rep ++
item.dc:creator: @ExtremeX-Scape Ryley
item.description:
@ExtremeX-Scape wrote:

Cash, RSGP, items, etc. Does not count for rep.

Read full topic

item.title: Fullscreen rep ++
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude462, post:4, topic:423712”]Well when I was going to give rep for a post. I got told that you can’t and they quoted some rule, can’t remember what one.

Oh here it is:

[quote]7. Offering a reward for someones help is not allowed, help is free on this community. [/quote][/quote]that rule is specific to cash as far as I know.

Read full topic

item.title: Fullscreen rep ++
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude462 sk8rdude462
item.description:
@sk8rdude462 wrote:

Well when I was going to give rep for a post. I got told that you can’t and they quoted some rule, can’t remember what one.

Oh here it is:

7. Offering a reward for someones help is not allowed, help is free on this community.

Read full topic

item.title: Fullscreen rep ++
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“sk8rdude462, post:2, topic:423712”]You rip it out of that client. Duh.
Oh and you can’t offer Rep for help.[/quote]

Rule 11: Never ask for reputation(rep). Reputation is to be handed out, at the forum members digression, as a reward for adding quality content to a thread, or the forum in general. Reputation abuse is punished.

It isn’t abuse for getting rep for an answer to a question.

Read full topic
